Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-01: Describe or provide a reference to your Disaster Recovery Plan (DRP).

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-02: Is an owner assigned who is responsible for the maintenance and review of the DRP?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-03: Can the Institution review your DRP and supporting documentation?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-04: Are any disaster recovery locations outside the Institution's Data Zone?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-05: Does your organization have a disaster recovery site or a contracted Disaster Recovery provider?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-06: Does your organization conduct an annual test of relocating to this site for disaster recovery purposes?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-07: Is there a defined problem/issue escalation plan in your DRP for impacted clients?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-08: Is there a documented communication plan in your DRP for impacted clients?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-09: Describe or provide a reference to how your disaster recovery plan is tested? (i.e. scope of DR tests, end-to-end testing, etc.)

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-10: Has the Disaster Recovery Plan been tested in the last year?  Please provide a summary of the results in Additional Information (including actual recovery time).

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-11: Do the documented test results identify your organizations actual recovery time capabilities for technology and facilities?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-12: Are all components of the DRP reviewed at least annually and updated as needed to reflect change?

Questionnaire Template Name: Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Tool (HECVAT) - DRP (v2.11)
Question: DRPL-13: Do you carry cyber-risk insurance to protect against unforeseen service outages, data that is lost or stolen, and security incidents?
